tool_description: Scrapes Linkedin company & profile data, Linkedin company jobs and Linkedin company & profile posts. You can also search for people, companies and jobs.
name: LinkedIn data scraper
title: LinkedIn data scraper

api_list.name: Person Posts ( WITH PAGINATION )
api_list.description: Scrapes posts of a linkedin profile alongwith reactions, comments,postLink and reposts data.

api_list.name: Suggestion Company
api_list.description: Comapny suggestions per query

api_list.name: Suggestion Service Catagory
api_list.description: Suggestions for Service Catagory per query

api_list.name: Search Jobs ( with filters )
api_list.description: You can searh for jobs using linkedin builtin filters.

optional_parameters.name: experience
optional_parameters.description: experience : experience refers to the experience level required for a specific job. It could be one or more of (1,2,3,4,5,6). 1 = Internship, 2 = Entry level, 3 = Associate, 4 = Mid senior level, 5=Director, 6=Executive. For eaxmple experience=2,5 means experience=Entry level,Director

optional_parameters.name: jobType
optional_parameters.description: jobType : Linkedin Job Type filter. It could one or more of F,P,C,T,V,I,O. F=Full time, P=Part time, C=Contract, T=Temporary, V=Volunteer, I=Internship, O=Other.

optional_parameters.name: postedAgo
optional_parameters.description: postedAgo : Time jobs was posted ago. It should be in seconds. e.g postedAgo=3600 means all jobs from past 1 hour and so on.

api_list.name: Suggestion Language
api_list.description: List of languages to be passed to language_list filter in search_people_with_filters endpoint
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://linkedin-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/suggestion_language"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "linkedin-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Suggestion Location
api_list.description: Loaction suggestions per query

api_list.name: Suggestion School
api_list.description: School suggestion per query

api_list.name: Suggestion Industry
api_list.description: Suggestions for indestry per query

api_list.name: Suggestion Company Size
api_list.description: Company Size suggestions for search companies with filters endpoint

api_list.name: Filter Function Suggestions
api_list.description: When you type something in search bar of linkedin sales navigator filter Functions, a list of suggested Job Functions apears in a dropdown. This endpoint returns those suggestions.

api_list.name: Filter Company Suggestions
api_list.description: When you type something in search bar of linkedin sales navigator filter Past Company or Current Company, a list of suggested company apears in a dropdown. This endpoint returns those suggestions.

api_list.name: Filter Job Title Suggestions
api_list.description: When you type something in search bar of linkedin sales navigator filter Job Title, a list of suggested Job Titles apear in a dropdown. This endpoint returns those suggestions.

api_list.name: Filter School Suggestions
api_list.description: When you type something in search bar of linkedin sales navigator filter School, a list of suggested schools apear in a dropdown. This endpoint returns those suggestions.

api_list.name: Filter Geography Location Suggestions
api_list.description: When you type something in search bar of linkedin sales navigator filter Geography, a list of suggested Geography Locations apears in a dropdown. This endpoint returns those suggestions. ( Zipcode filter not included )

api_list.name: Filter Languages
api_list.description: When you select Languages in Linkedin Sales Navigator Filters, a list of suggested languages apear in a dropdown. This endpoint returns those suggestions.
api_list.code:

url = "https://linkedin-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/filter_languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "linkedin-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Filter Industry Suggestions

api_list.name: Filter Years In

api_list.name: Filter Search Suggestions
api_list.description: When you type something in search bar of linkedin sales navigator, a list of suggested people apears in a dropdown. This endpoint returns those suggestions.

api_list.name: Filter Company Type
api_list.description: When you select Company Type in Linkedin Sales Navigator Filters, a list of suggested Company types apear in a dropdown. This endpoint returns those suggestions.

api_list.name: Company Posts ( WITH PAGINATION )

api_list.name: Filter Seniority Level
api_list.description: When you select Seniority Level in Linkedin Sales Navigator Filters, a list of suggested Seniority levels apear in a dropdown. This endpoint returns those suggestions.
